programme.title: Tarihin İzleri
programme.desc: Binlerce yıllık birikimin bugune yansıyan parçaları, lahitler, minareler, yazmalar, dokumalar, mozaikler ve zamanın mekanla buluştuğu benzersiz efsanelerin hikâyelere konu olduğu Tarihi İzler Ezgi Aşıkın sunumu ile bayram boyunca 24te.

programme.title: Kurt Kız
programme.desc: Bir Turk obasına hain saldırıda bulunan barbarlar, herkesi oldururler. Turk kahramanı Kurt Kız Aybiçe bu katliamın ocunu almaya yemin eder.Kurtlar tarafından buyutulen bir Aybiçe, obasında oldurulenlerin intikamını almak için kahramanca savaşır.

programme.title: Ataman ile Devr-i Alem
programme.desc: Parisin Eyfeli, İtalyanın Pissa Kulesi, Venedikin gondolları... Farklı bir soluk, farklı bir macera Ataman Erkulun gozunden dunya turuna ne dersiniz? Eğer siz de keyifli bir dunya turuna çıkmak isterseniz, Ataman ile Devri Alem 360ta...

programme.title: Gokyuzunden
programme.desc: Turkiyeye hiç bu gozden bakmadınız. Anadolunun eşsiz guzellikleri, doğa manzaraları, tarihi kentleri ve çok daha fazlası drone ile çekildi. Ortaya harika bir belgesel çıktı. Cennet vatanı bir de Gokyuzunden izlemek isteyenler ekran başına...

programme.title: Hamsi Nuri
programme.desc: Karadenizden İstanbula çalışmak için gelen Nuri, buyuk bir iş hanında çaycılık yapmaktadır. Karadenizli şivesiyle, handa kendine ozgu bir karakter yaratmıştır ve herkes onu Hamsi Nuri diye çağırmaktadır. Nuri, bir gun handaki burolardan birine çay taşırken, şirketin ortaklarıyla ilgili onemli bir olaya kulak misafiri olur. Hamsi Nuri, çok geçmeden başının derde girdiğinin farkına varır.

programme.title: Saffet Beni Affet
programme.desc: Yoksul bir yaşamdan gelen Saffet, yıllar sonra bir meyve suyu fabrikası sahibi olur. Saffet, eski yaşamını tamamen değiştirmeyi, zengin insanlarla aynı yaşamı surdurmeyi istemektedir. Ancak eşi, yeni yaşamlarına uyum sağlayamayınca ondan ayrılır. Yeni sosyal çevresinden bir kadınla evlenen Saffet, yeni eşinin surduğu yaşamın kendisine uygun olmadığına karar verir. Bir sure sonra ondan da ayrılır. Hiç beklemediği bir anda, Saffetin karşısına hayatının aşkı çıkar. Ancak bu aşk, onu bir trajediye surekleyecektir.

programme.title: Baş Belası
programme.desc: Mafya içinde tek kurşun lakabıyla un yapmış bir besteciyle sevdiği kız için surekli intihar girişiminde bulunan bir adamın oykusu anlatılıyor. Rastlantı sonucu iki adamın yolları kesişir. Bir sure sonra saf aşık, kabadayının baş belası haline gelir.

programme.title: Turk Mutfağı
programme.desc: Yemek, kulturumuzle harmanlanarak her kaşıkta bir hikaye ve gelenek barındıran tariflerle 360 ekranında hayat buluyor.

programme.title: Seksenler
programme.desc: Klasik bir Turk ailesinin yaşamını konu alan eğlenceli bir donem sit-comu... Sosyal hayattaki değişim, hayatımıza giren yeniliklerin bizleri nasıl etkilediği gozler onune seriliyor. Seksenler dizisi bize kaybettiğimiz insani değerleri yeni nesillere tekrar kazandırmak amacıyla geçmişe yapılmış eğlenceli bir yolculuk... Çocuklar; sobayı, merdaneli makineyi, pul yapıştırıp yolladığımız mektupları, anket defterlerini, siyah onlukleri, kolalı yakaları, sokaklarda koşturarak surduğumuz telli arabaları ve misket dolu torbaları ilk defa bu dizide goruyor.

programme.title: Ataman ile Devr-i Alem
programme.desc: Parisin Eyfeli, İtalyanın Pissa Kulesi, Venedikin gondolları... Farklı bir soluk, farklı bir macera Ataman Erkulun gozunden dunya turuna ne dersiniz? Eğer siz de keyifli bir dunya turuna çıkmak isterseniz, Ataman ile Devri Alem 360ta...

programme.title: Ateş Parçası
programme.desc: Bir çadır tiyatrosunda çalışan Azize yoksul, sıradan yaşamında kuçuk mutluluklar ve içten sevgilerle yetinmektedir. Mert, altın kalpli, guler yuzlu ve duşuk çeneli bir kızdır. Tiyatroda şarkı soyleyip soytarılık yaparak muşterileri eğlendirmektedir. Niyet tavşanının çektiği faldan yakında hayatının erkeğiyle tanışacağını oğrenir. Ve kısmeti yağmurlu bir gecede karşısına çıkar. Sosyetenin hızlı çapkınlarından Tarık, genç kızı mecburen arabasına alınca hayatları tahmin edemeyecekleri olçude değişecektir. Tarık, hayatını allak bullak eden baş belasından bir turlu yakasını kurtaramaz. Azize ise ansızın hayatına giren bu fal prensine gonlunu çoktan kaptırmıştır. Ancak Tarık nişanlıdır ve Azize ile arasında kapanmayacak farklar vardır.

programme.title: Lezzet Peşinde
programme.desc: Lezzet Peşinde, muhteşem tatların ve lezzet sırlarının yanı sıra, işin ustalarının hayat hikayeleri ve başarı seruvenleriyle ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Baş Belası
programme.desc: Mafya içinde tek kurşun lakabıyla un yapmış bir besteciyle sevdiği kız için surekli intihar girişiminde bulunan bir adamın oykusu anlatılıyor. Rastlantı sonucu iki adamın yolları kesişir. Bir sure sonra saf aşık, kabadayının baş belası haline gelir.

programme.title: Ben Bilirim Çocuk
programme.desc: Sahneye çocuklar çıkıyor; heyecan ve bolca eğlence başlıyor. Ben Bilirim ‘Çocuk’ programında, minik yarışmacılar buyuk bir neşe ile soruları cevaplıyor.

programme.title: Ben Bilirim Çocuk
programme.desc: Sahneye çocuklar çıkıyor; heyecan ve bolca eğlence başlıyor. Ben Bilirim ‘Çocuk’ programında, minik yarışmacılar buyuk bir neşe ile soruları cevaplıyor.

programme.title: Aileler Yarışıyor
programme.desc: Gunluk hayattan çok basit soruların sokaktaki 100 kişiye sorulması sonucu alınan en populer cevapları bulmaya çalışan yarışmacılar, final etabında buyuk odulu kazanmak için yarışıyorlar.

programme.title: Devlet Kuşu
programme.desc: Gecekondu mahallesine apartman yapmaya gelen milyoner bir iş adamının şımarık kızı, bu mahallede yaşayan yoksul bir delikanlı olan Mustafaya ilgi duyar. Yoksulluk içinde olan ailesini kurtarmak için onunla evlenmeyi duşunur onceleri Mustafa... Ama sonunda alaştığı çevreden kopamayan genç adam, mahallesindeki sevgilisi Aynura doner.

programme.title: Gulşah Kuçuk Anne
programme.desc: Babası suçsuz yere cezaevine giren, annesi ise hasta yatağına duşen Gulşah, kuçuk kardeşine bakabilmek için elinden geleni yapar. Gunduz sokaklarda şarkı soyler, akşamları da kardeşine annelik yapar.

programme.title: Gelincik
programme.desc: Kıbrıs çıkartmasından sonra Sideye yerleşen Yuzbaşı Alişan, dort çocuğuyla birlikte mutlu ve sade bir hayat surmektedir. Bu sırada istemediği bir evliliğe zorlanan Fato, değişiklik için kasabaya gelmiştir. Alişan ve Fato aradıkları mutluluğu birbirlerinde bulurlar. Ancak Alişan ile Fatonun aşkı ofkeli bir babanın gazabıyla golgelenecektir.

programme.title: Aşka Tovbe
programme.desc: Şehbal, İzmir’de oğretmenlik yapmaktadır. Kuzeni Mubin, tatilini geçirmesi için Şehbal’i İstanbul’a yanına çağırır. Bunun yıllardır beklediği evlilik teklifi olduğunu duşunen genç kız heyecanlanır. Şehbal, koşke gittiğinde duş kırıklığına uğrar. Çunku, Mubin ona açılarak Nazan’ı sevdiğini ve bu aşka Şehbal’in aracılık etmesini teklif edecektir.

programme.desc: Turkiye ve dunya gundemine ilişkin onemli konular izleyicilere aktarılıyor.

programme.desc: Ajans - Yeni Gunde, yurtta ve dunyada yaşanan gelişmeler izleyici ile sıcağı sıcağına paylaşılıyor. Programda sağlık, spor ve kultur sanat koşelerine de yer veriliyor.

programme.title: Satır Arası

programme.desc: Avrupadan Futbolda, Avrupa liglerinde oynanan maçlardan goruntuler, takımların son durumları ve oyuncuların performansları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Aşk ve Ceza
programme.desc: Yasemin; yirmi beş yaşlarında, orta sınıf ahlakına sahip, bir reklam ajansında çalışan ve bir hafta sonra olacak duğununun heyecanını yaşayan genç bir kadındır. Okuması için her turlu fedakarlık yaptığı nişanlısı Mehmet ile yakın arkadaşı Mujde’yi kendi yatağında yakalar.Yaşadığı ihanet uzerine aşka, evliliğe ve masumiyete inancını yitiren Yasemin, emekli oğretmen annesinin yaşadığı Bodrum’a gider. Öfke ve uzuntu içindeki Yasemin karşısına ilk çıkan erkek olan Savaş’la birlikte olur ve duşurduğu bir kolye hariç, hiçbir iz bırakmadan, Kulkedisi gibi ortadan kaybolur.

programme.title: Sıla
programme.desc: Guneydoğuda filizlenen zor bir aşkın oykusu... Kanun tanımaz tore ve toreye karşı gelen bir aşk... Sıla, on uç yaşındayken ailesinden koparılıp, İstanbuldaki çocuksuz bir aileye verilir. Ancak yıllar sonra yuzunu bile hatırlayamadığı ağabeyinin hayatını kurtarmak için berdel olarak, aşiret reisi Boranla evlendirilir. Sıla, artık buyuk bir evde hapiste gibidir.

programme.title: Kertenkele
programme.desc: Zekası ve sıra dışı yetenekleri sayesinde İstanbul polisi tarafından bir turlu ele geçirilemeyen profesyonel hırsız Kertenkelenin Hayatın yalan olsa da aşkın gerçek olsun dedirten hikayesi...Mesleki hayatını takıntılı bir şekilde Kertenkele’yi yakalamaya adayan komiser Ünsal’ın tum çabalarına rağmen Kertenkele izini kaybettirmenin bir yolunu hep bulmuştur.Kertenkele sıfır din bilgisi ile imamlık yapmaya çalışırken karşısına gayrimenkul kralı Ekrem Bey’in guzeller guzeli torunu Zehra çıkar.

programme.title: Çocuklar Duymasın
programme.desc: Farklı karakter yapılarına sahip Meltem ve Haluk çifti, surekli tartışıyor olmalarına rağmen, birbirlerini deli gibi sevmektedir. Başarılı bir kariyere sahip Meltem, evde ailesinin butun ihtiyaçlarına koşturabilme yeteneğine ve enerjisine sahiptir. Tipik bir Anadolu erkeği olan Halukun tek derdi ise yemek, futbol ve tembelliktir. Surekli didişme halinde olan çiftin anlaştığı tek konu ise kızlar ve arabalarla kafayı bozmuş olan oğulları Havuç ve kendini beğenmiş kızları Duygu ile ilgili alınan kararlardır.

programme.title: Bez Bebek
programme.desc: Oyuncaklar ulkesinde yaşayan bez bebek Nana, 100. yaş gununde herkesi şaşırtarak, gerçek bir insan olmayı diler. Nana, insan olup eski sahibi Makbulenin yanına gitmek ister çunku Makbule zor durumdadır. Yakışıklı ve başarılı bir iş adamı olan Hakan’a ve onun iki sevimli çocuğuna bakıcılık yapmakta olan Makbule, ailenin ayrılmaz bir ferdi olmuştur. Hakanla evlenmek isteyen Simgenin tek derdi ise Makbuleyi huzurevine yollamaktır. Bu yuzden tuzaklar kurmaya da başlamıştır.

programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Selin, Leyla ve Nazlı anne ve babalarını trafik kazasında yitirdikten sonra amcalarının yanına sığınırlar. Ancak onun huysuz karısı Aslı ve Aslının onceki evliliğinden olan kızı Kıvılcım tarafından surekli eziyet gorurler. Kızlar dunyada yapayalnız kaldıklarını zannederler ama aslında dunyanın kaderini değiştirecek ve kotu Hadese karşı savaşacak Selenayı Ütopya gezegeninden çağıracak sırra sahiptirler.

programme.title: Yahşi Cazibe
programme.desc: Cazibe, Azeri asıllı guzel bir kızdır. Turkiyede yaşamak isteyen Cazibenin onundeki tek seçenek, bir Turkle evlenmektir. Karşısına ekonomik sıkıntıları olan Kemal çıkar. Alacağı yuklu para karşısında havalara uçan Kemal, bu evlilik teklifini hiç duşunmeden kabul eder. İkili ilk anda birbirinden hoşlanmaz ancak zamanla bu anlaşmazlık yerini sevgiye ve aşka bırakır. Bu arada şupheci polis komşuları Peker Pekmez onların korkulu ruyası olur.

programme.title: Adanalı
programme.desc: İstanbul’da kapkaç, soygun, kaçakçılık ve dolandırıcılık gibi adi suçlar gunluk hayatın bir parçası olmuştur. İstanbul’u kurtarmak için İzmirde surgunde bulunan Komiser Adanalıyı geri çağırmaktan başka çare kalmaz.Maraz Ali ise İstanbul’un en buyuk suç çetesinin lideridir. Dışarıdan bakıldığında, bir araba yıkama yerinin mutevazi sahibidir. Ama gerçekte, şehirde donen her turlu hırsızlık, kapkaç ve soygun olaylarının buyuk bolumununde onun parmağı vardır. Bugune kadar hiç kimse Maraz Ali’yi içeri tıkabilecek bir ipucu yakalayamamıştır. Bakalım, Adanalı bu konuda ne kadar başarılı olabilecek?

programme.title: Bir Zamanlar Çukurova
programme.desc: Çukurovada aşkın, intikamın, kavganın ve rekabetin oykusu konu ediliyor.

programme.title: Eşkıya Dunyaya Hukumdar Olmaz
programme.desc: Turkiyenin en guçlu ailesi olan Çakırbeylilerin karşısında bu sefer daha zorlu bir sınav vardır: Avrupanın en buyuğu olmak... Bakalım, guç savaşlarında kazanan taraf kim olacak, dunyayı somuren guçler mi, onlara başkaldıran Çakırbeyliler mi?

programme.title: Benim Annem Bir Melek
programme.desc: Neriman, ailesinin uzerine titreyen titiz bir annedir. Ama onun çok buyuk bir zaafı vardır: Kuçuk oğlu Çetin... Çetin’in bir eş ve bir baba olması, Neriman’ın ona, kuçuk bir çocukmuş gibi, ozen gostermesine engel olamamıştır. Çunku ona gore, gelini Ece ne yaparsa yapsın, oğluna kendisi kadar iyi bakamayacaktır. Bu arada buyuk oğlu Metin de yeni bir aşka yelken açmıştır. Sevgilisi Nalan ailesi ile tanışmak isteyince, Çetin ve Metin anneleri Neriman’dan uzak bir tanışma yemeği organize eder. Yemekte sadece Çetin, Metin ve Çetin’in eşi Ece olacaktır. Babaları Cahit de melek anneleri Neriman’ı oyalamakla gorevlidir.

programme.title: Aşk ve Ceza
programme.desc: Yasemin; yirmi beş yaşlarında, orta sınıf ahlakına sahip, bir reklam ajansında çalışan ve bir hafta sonra olacak duğununun heyecanını yaşayan genç bir kadındır. Okuması için her turlu fedakarlık yaptığı nişanlısı Mehmet ile yakın arkadaşı Mujde’yi kendi yatağında yakalar.Yaşadığı ihanet uzerine aşka, evliliğe ve masumiyete inancını yitiren Yasemin, emekli oğretmen annesinin yaşadığı Bodrum’a gider. Öfke ve uzuntu içindeki Yasemin karşısına ilk çıkan erkek olan Savaş’la birlikte olur ve duşurduğu bir kolye hariç, hiçbir iz bırakmadan, Kulkedisi gibi ortadan kaybolur.

programme.title: Gece Ajansı
programme.desc: Gundemi sarsan olaylar, gun içinde olup bitenler, gundeme damgasını vuran siyasiler ve kişiler, yakın plan yansımalarla doğru haberin adresi Akit Haberde…

programme.title: Gun Başlıyor
programme.desc: Siz de doğruya doğru, eğriye eğri diyorsanız. Gune bizimle başlayın. Guçlunun, kuvvetlinin değil, haklının sozunun geçtiği program Gun Başlıyor Ahmet Özdemir in sunumuyla hafta içi her gun 07:00de Akit TVde.

programme.title: Sağlık Vakti
programme.desc: Sağlıklı yaşamdan, ruh sağlığına, sağlıklı beslenmeye, teşhis ve tedaviye dair her şey bu programda. Sağlımızı korumak için neler yapmalıyız, nasıl beslenmeliyiz ? Dr. Melisanur Ülku Tumer in sunumu ile Sağlık Vakti cumartesi 10:30da Akit TVde…

programme.title: Eğitim Atlası
programme.desc: Verimli ders çalışamıyorum, konuları hemen unutuyorum, dikkat problemim var, sınavlarda stres oluyorum, motivasyonum iyi değil, nasıl çalışacağımı bilemiyorum diyorsanız; Eğitimci-Yazar Prof. Dr. Ahmet Akın ile Eğitim Atlası programında buluşalım.

programme.title: Spor Aktuel

programme.title: Aldatmak
programme.desc: Hem kızını hem de torununu kaybetmenin eşiğindeki Guzide, hayatının en zor kararının kıyısında savrulmaktadır. Bu zor zamanlarda umduğu desteği goremeyecek, kendi başına ayakta durmayı bir kez daha oğrenmek zorunda kalacaktır.Yurek burkan kaza ve devamında Behramın vurulması butun aileyi dehşete duşurmuştur. Behramı hedef alan namlunun diğer ucunda kimin olduğu Dicleli ailesi için buyuk bir soru işaretidir. Beklenmedik bir ismin Guzide ve ailesinin hayatına girmesinin ise herkes için geri donulmez etkileri olacaktır.

programme.title: Bir Kuçuk Gun Işığı
programme.desc: On yıldır bir yalanın içinde yaşayan Elif, her şeye sıfırdan başlamak zorunda kalır. Genç kadının yeni yaşamındaki yolu zengin iş adamı Fırat ile kesiştiğinde ise her şey daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.

programme.title: Gençliğim Eyvah
programme.desc: Aynı semtin iki duşman kebapçısı Urfalı Bozoğlu ve Adanalı Asmalı ailelerinin etrafında donen aşk, sır ve entrika dolu olaylar konu ediliyor.Gençliğim Eyvah; aşkların, buyuk sırların ve beceriksizce çevirilen entrikaların komedisi...

programme.title: Zembilli
programme.desc: Zembilli kasabası, Muradın askerden izine gelmesiyle bayram yerine doner. Muradın kardeşi Fidan uzun zamandır, gizli saklı, Muradın can dostu Ademe sevdalıdır. Ademden tek isteği abisine ilişkilerini soylemesidir, saklamaktan yorulmuştur. Murad kasabaya donduğunde, sevdalı olduğu Esmaya gorucu geldiğini oğrenir. Gitmeden once soz kesmek ister ama Esmanın babasının bir şartı vardır, Torosların namlı pehlivanı Balabanı yenerse, kızını verecektir. Kasabanın en havalı kızı Gulnura âşık olan, Murad ve Ademin can kardeşi Fırıncı Kadir, aldığı bir mektupla Gulnuru kaçırma planları kurmaya başlar. Harama el uzatmayan, naif kalbi ve kaygılarıyla Muezzin Vahiti de bu plana dahil eder.

programme.title: Buz Devri 3: Dinozorların Şafağı
programme.desc: Geçen onca zamana rağmen Scrat, hala meşe palamudunun peşinden koşmaktadır. Manny ve Ellie ise minik mamutlarının doğumunu heyecanla beklemektedir. Dinozor yumurtalarını kaçırıp kendine geçici bir aile kuran tembel Sid ise yine başını belaya sokmuştur. Kılıç dişli kaplan Diego, arkadaşlarıyla ilişkisinde yumuşak bir tavır sergileyip sergilemediğini sorgulamaktadır. Başı dertte olan Sid’i kurtarmak için bir araya gelen kahramanlarımız, dinozorların gizemli dunyasına doğru yola çıkarlar. Bu topraklarda savaşçı bitkiler ve onune çıkanlara saldırıp duran hayvanlar da vardır. Kahramanlarımız burada, acımasız dinozor avcısı, tek gozlu gelincik Buck ile karşılaşır.

programme.title: Gorevimiz Tatil
programme.desc: Gelecek kaygısıyla bugunu yaşamayı unutan Sıtkı Mutlu, 9 yıldır ailesini tatile goturmeyi ihmal etmiştir. Bir aile psikiyatrı tarafından tatil gorevi verilen Sıtkı Mutlu, bulabildiği en ucuz karavanla ailesini tatile goturmek uzere yola çıkacaktır. Ailenin, terapi seansıyla başlayan değişimleri, tatilleri ile devam edecektir. Ailece bir arada olmanın yeniden keşfedileceği tatil macerası, pek çok kişinin hayatını değiştirip, ulke gundemine bile oturacaktır.

programme.title: Aile Saadeti
programme.desc: Konaktakiler Hakkının adamları tarafından dovulen Parsın etrafında pervane olur. Hakkı, Tekinden aldığı paranın bir kısmını toparlayıp şirkete gider ve Rıdo, Bertu ve Dobermanın gozaltında olduğunu soyler. Konaktakilerin parası bitmiştir, eşyaları ve kitapları satıp para kazanmayı duşunurler. Bir çıkış yolu bulamayınca Tulay, hiç vazgeçemediği kurkunu satmayı onerir, Emin de çalıştığı atolyeden avans isteyecektir.

programme.title: ATV Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gun içinde yaşanan gelişmeler ve gundemde yer alan konular izleyicilere aktarılıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, kulturden sanata Turkiye ve dunya gundemine ilişkin onemli gelişmeler canlı bağlantılarla ekrana geliyor. Program konuklarıyla gundemdeki olayların analizi yapılıyor.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Morbius, hastalığına deva bulmaya çalışırken bambaşka bir varlığa donuşen bilim insanı Dr. Michael Morbiusun hikayesini konu ediyor. Dr. Morbius, muzdarip olduğu nadir gorulen kan hastalığını, deneysel bir yontemle tedavi etmeye çalışır. Hastalığı, elektroşok terapisi ve vampir yarasaları kullanarak iyileştirmeye çalışan Morbius, korkunç bir sonuçla karşı karşıya kalır. Deneysel tedavi ile vampire donuşen Morbiusun hayatında artık hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacaktır. Birçok zorlu durumla mucadele etmek zorunda kalan Morbiusun hayatta kalmak için surekli kana ihtiyacı vardır ve artık ışığı çıkması imkansızdır. Bu sorunların yanı sıra o, birçok insanustu guce de sahip olur.

programme.desc: Konaktakiler Hakkının adamları tarafından dovulen Parsın etrafında pervane olur. programme.title: Guven Bana
programme.desc: Muge Anlının sunduğu Guven Bananın yarışmacı koltuğunda kazandıkları 400 Bin TL ile yarışmaya devam eden olan Şafak Sezer ve Suzan Kardeş var. Sultanbeyli Anadolu Lisesi Bilişim Sınıfı için yarışan ikili, verdikleri yanıtlarla yolun sonuna kadar devam edebilecekler mi?Dorduncu bolumun diğer yarışmacıları ise ekranların sevilen spor yorumcuları Sinan Engin ve Abdulkerim Durmaz... Birbirlerine Guven Bana deyip, bağlılıklarını dile getirecekler. Bu ikili arasında para mı kazanacak, yoksa guven mi?

programme.title: ATV Ana Haber

programme.title: Kim Milyoner Olmak İster?
programme.desc: Dunyanın en çok seyredilen ve en çok kazandıran bilgi yarışması Kim Milyoner Olmak İster?, Oktay Kaynarcanın sunumuyla ekrana geliyor. Programa Turkiyenin farklı yerlerinden ya da farklı ulkelerden başvuru yapıp, mulakatla seçilen yarışmacılar katılıyor. Yine moral desteği için yarışmacıların yakınları da studyoda yerlerini alıyorlar. Toplamda on uç soruyu yanıtlamak için yarışmacılara joker hakları sunuluyor. Ayrıca iki baraj hakkı da veriliyor. Baraj sorularına doğru yanıt verildiğinde o ana kadar kazanılan odul, her durumda yarışmacının oluyor. On uç soru doğru yanıtlanırsa kazanılacak odul 5 milyon TL...

programme.title: Dudullu Postası
programme.desc: Sıra bende Kaarşiiim...

programme.title: Kutu
programme.desc: Dila, ozguvenli, başarılı genç bir kadın. Başarıyı ise ilişkilerinde gosteremiyor. Uzun ilişkilerinde şansı yaver gitmiyor. Peki neden? Koşeler: tek gecelik ilişkiler, bağlanma, kontrol. Bakalım Dila Kutudan çıkabilecek mi?

programme.title: Çalınmış Hayatlar
programme.desc: Henuz 17 yaşında olan Munevver Karabulutun sevgiyle başlayan hikayesi, buyuk bir trajediyle sonlanmıştı. Kâğıt toplayıcılığı yapan bir adamın kaldırdığı çop tenekesinin kapağı, gerilim dolu bir surecin de başlangıcı oldu. Karabulut ailesi kayıp kızlarının peşindeyken hepimizin yureğini parçalayan bir gerçekle yuz yuze kaldı. O gun gerçekte neler yaşanmıştı? Cem Garipoğlu Munevveri taammuden mi oldurmuştu? Meçhule karıştıktan sonra nerede saklanıyordu? Karabulut ailesi yaşadıkları bu travmanın ustesinden gelebilecek miydi? Toplumsal hafızamıza damga vuran Munevver Karabulut cinayetine yer veren Çalınmış Hayatlar olay gununden katilin yakalanma anına kadar tum yaşananları gerçek goruntuler, gerçek goruntuler, gerçek tanıklar ve dramanın iç içe geçtiği bir anlatımla ekrana taşıyor. Munevver karabulut cinayetine dair bildikleriniz, unuttuklarınız, hiç duymadıklarınız Çalınmış Hayatlarda...

programme.title: T Kuşağı
programme.desc: Çok kısa bir surede dunya çapında buyuk kullanıcı kitlelerine ulaşarak alanının devlerinden biri haline gelen Tiktok nasıl ortaya çıktı? Gunluk hayatımızda sıkça gorduğumuz ve sansasyon yaratan videoların olduğu bu uygulamayı farklı kılan noktalara tanık olun. Peki, fenomenlerin gozunden TikTok dunyası nasıl gorunuyor?

programme.title: Sen Uyuyunca
programme.desc: Kaliteli uyku ve doğru zamanda yeterince uyumak, hayatta kalmak için yemek ve su kadar onemli. Yuzyıllardır evrimleşen insanlık tarihinde, uykunun da evrimleşmesi kaçınılmaz. Yorucu bir gunun sonunda uyumak ve ertesi gunu aksatmadan kaliteli bir yaşam surmek bir maraton.

programme.title: Doğu
programme.desc: Doğunun komedyen olabilmek için once network geliştirmesi gerektiğine gonulden inanan Özgur, Doğuyu Cihangirde yaşayan oyuncu arkadaşı Muhsinle tanıştırır. Her sokağının sanat koktuğu iddia edilen Cihangir gezileri, Özgur ve Doğu için oldukça deneysel bir tecrube olacaktır.

programme.title: Boru 2039
programme.desc: Halcyon buyuk saldırısını gerçekleştirmek uzereyken Boru, hem inini hem Almila Erki korumak zorundadır. Tomrisin geçmişindeki sır açığa çıkar ve kurtuluşa giden yolu açar.

programme.title: T Kuşağı
programme.desc: Gerçekten TikTok karşısında kafesteki bir fare gibi koşullandırılıyor muyuz? Kullanıcılarında bile sıkça bağımlılığa sebep olan sosyal medya platformları, fenomenleri nasıl etkiliyor? Tum gunlerini TikTokta geçiren fenomenler için işler hiç de duşunulduğu gibi değil! TikTokun hem fenomenlerinde hem de kullanıcılarında yarattığı psikolojik etkilerin bilimsel açıdan incelendiği bu bolumu sakın kaçırmayın!

programme.title: Sen Uyuyunca
programme.desc: Uyku; katmanlardan oluşan, bilgi ve surprizlerle dolu bir sureç ve tum canlılar için uyku, parmak izi gibi benzersiz. Uykumuzu iyi aldığımızda hormon ve hucrelerimiz adeta ışıldarken, uykusuz kaldığımızda beynimize ve vucudumuza neler yapıyoruz biliyor muyuz? Belki de her şey, beynimizin yeterince dinlenemiyor olmasına bağlıdır… Tum bu soruların cevabını ve Baharın uyku testi deneyimlerini uzman yorumlarıyla dinliyoruz.

programme.title: Doğu
programme.desc: Kendisinin aksine hepsi işinde gucunde evli barklı olan eski okul arkadaşlarını ziyaret eden Doğu, Özguru de yanında goturur. Butun gun kendisi hakkındaki şakaları alttan alan ve arkadaşlarına uyum sağlamaya çalışan Doğu, sonunda isyan bayrağını çeker. Özgurun ise evin kuçuk oğlu Ulaşla halledilmesi gereken bir meselesi vardır.

programme.title: Sen Uyuyunca

programme.title: Doğu
programme.desc: Zeynep Doğuyu seneler sonra baş başa yemeğe davet etmiştir. Üstelik Doğunun çok sevineceğini duşunduğu bir de surprizi vardır; Stand up gecesine bilet. Kendisinin neden izleyici koltuğunda onların ise sahnede olduğunu sorgulamaya başlayan Doğu, ardı ardına çıkan komedyenlerin kendisini hedef alan şakalarıyla iyiden iyiye gerilecektir.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is more important, reliable source of news.

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: The news as it happened, presented, clarified and analysed by experts and specialists. Studio-based and in-the field summaries and analysis of the events to have marked the previous twenty-four hours enable understanding and place within a wider context the issues that have shaped, focused and given direction over the course of the previous day.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: BYD, the worlds largest EV manufacturer, is expanding into Pakistan. Chiles hydrogen-powered train: Does hydrogen for rail have a future? And Tanzania hopes e-transport will boost its economy and help the climate.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is more important, reliable source of news.

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: Rural and low-income areas have missed out on expanding infrastructure because not that many people can purchase EVs there. This presents a classic chicken and egg problem: people dont buy EVs if there arent any charging stations _ but nobodys building charging stations if there arent any EVs.

programme.title: Tomorrow Today
programme.desc: The human body is made up of many different kinds of cells, and there are trillions of them. Now a major international project is mapping how they are distributed. And: Viruses can infect those cells. We look at whats being done to fight pathogens like HIV.

programme.title: Shift
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence is offering the possibility of a digital afterlife _ where the deceased can live on as avatars or chatbots. These AI developments could bring profound changes to the grieving process.

programme.title: Switzerlands Gold
programme.desc: Four of the seven largest gold refineries in the world are located in Switzerland. However, the legal regulations are weak. What is the industry doing to ensure that no ""dirty gold" ends up in Switzerland?

programme.title: DW News

programme.title: To the Point
programme.desc: Cars, phones and fighter jets _ nearly every high-tech product contains rare earths. And most of them come from China. How vulnerable does that make western industrial nations? Our guests: Felix Lee (SZ-Dossier), Tim Borgschulte (Noble BC GmbH), Mareike Ohlberg (GmfUS)

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: 77 per cent of Africas population are below the age of thirty-five yet their interests are under-represented poltically and economically. This show aims to redress the balance by providing a voice to the largest demographic group on the continent. These dynamic younger people are politically engaged and will determine the future path their countries, and the continent as a whole, will follow in the twenty-first century. Presented by Eddy Micah Jr. and Wanjiku Mwaura.

programme.title: Transforming Business: Why stagnant economic growth in Latin America is linked to its below par transport infrastructure
programme.desc: Stagnant economic growth in Latin America is linked to its failure to invest in proper transport infrastructure. Only 23% of the regions roads are paved and its home to one of the least extensive rail networks in the world. That makes it really uncompetitive to do business, with traders paying much higher logistics costs compared to other regions of the world.

They hope more people will train to become running guides _ so that sport becomes open to all.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Groups

programme.title: Good Night!
programme.desc: Unlike most children, Lilis favourite time of the day is bedtime. Lili loves listening to lullabies before drifting off to sleep, especially with her cherished Teddy Bear. Get ready for bed with Lili and Teddy Bear, as their soothing lullabies will help young children settle down and peacefully prepare for bedtime.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Good Night!
programme.desc: Unlike most children, Lilis favourite time of the day is bedtime. Lili loves listening to lullabies before drifting off to sleep, especially with her cherished Teddy Bear. Get ready for bed with Lili and Teddy Bear, as their soothing lullabies will help young children settle down and peacefully prepare for bedtime.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Cubie
programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Cubie loves to build and, with help from his friends, the cheerful cubes, erects inventive new constructions. This enjoyable series from Duck TV helps children build their spatial awareness and observational skills while learning about new prepositions and the basics of building.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Forms Are Yours!
programme.desc: This wonderful and entertaining animated programme for babies and preschoolers reveals the amazing concept of contrast. Children are introduced to different shapes and colours through beautiful contrasting images and animations.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Didy Baby

programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Train

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Veggie-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The protagonists of The Shapies introduce us to the world of shapes through their adventures. They show us where they fit in, what things they resemble, how they transform if they are together and how they make up entire stories.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: In the Museum

Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Veggie-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Join the children as the enjoy their holiday visiting the lake in these silent animated shorts. Follow them as they go on exciting adventures together, exploring the lake and having fun on its sandy shorelines. Learn about the different everyday objects and colours while introducing your children to new multi-sensory activities.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. programme.title: Didy Baby

programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Veggie-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. programme.title: Elf World

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. programme.title: Get Up!

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. programme.title: Elf World

programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after World War II, Maria Altman sought to regain a world famous painting of her aunt plundered by the Nazis. She did so not just to regain what was rightfully hers, but also to obtain some measure of justice for the death, destruction, and massive art theft perpetrated by the Nazis.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Limitless (2011) is an American thriller directed by Neil Burger and starring Bradley Cooper and Abbie Cornish. In order to get rid of bad luck, a writer named Eddie takes a secret drug called NZT. As a result, the guy can use 100 percent of his brain abilities and this changes his entire life. In a short time he makes a lot of money, but soon begins to suffer from the ominous side effects of the drug. And when Eddie tries to overcome his addiction, he finds out the terrible truth...

programme.desc: You will learn how to make a beautiful yet simple picture using some unusual techniques with your child. We will draw a bush with green leaves, and not only draw, but also blow paint with a cocktail straw.

programme.title: Art Land
programme.desc: Did you know that you can create pictures not only with paints? Plasticine, sand, flour, and even… shaving cream _ all of these can be used to create masterpieces of childrens art.

programme.title: Sunny Songs
programme.desc: Fun songs with simple vocabulary are a great way to learn English. Numerous repetitions and a lively rhythm will help girls and boys from 2 years old to memorize the words. programme.title: Crafty Hands: Optical illusion
programme.desc: Little inventors will be able to enrich their vocabulary and make a toy for their very own collection. In this episode, were going to make an optical illusion.

programme.title: Global Week-End
programme.desc: News stories as they happen. Analysis and coverage of the most important global events as they unfold providing insight into their significance and relevance for communities worldwide. From politics to society all that has an impact or will impact on the globe as a whole is presented in an accessible and insightful form to allow one to keep up-to-date on the factors changing the world we live in.
